entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. Temperature falling to minus 22 in the morning then rising.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 22 in the morning then rising. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 25.
